welcome to platinum hostel, gaza

Discover Community and Convenience at Platinum Hostel, Gaza!

about us

Welcome to Platinum Hostel, Gaza! Located in the vibrant area of Gaza, our branch offers a range of amenities and services designed to enhance your college experience. Our well-equipped gym, basketball court, and game room provide opportunities for relaxation, recreation, and socialization. What sets us apart is our campus bus service, offering free transportation to and from campus, ensuring convenience and ease of commute. At Platinum Hostel, Gaza, we are dedicated to providing a comfortable and inclusive living environment that supports your academic journey.

rooms

1 in a room

Experience a cozy and private space in our one-in-a-room accommodation at Platinum Hostel, Gaza. Stay connected with WiFi, enjoy a comfortable environment with air conditioning, catch up on your favorite shows with DSTV cable, and refresh yourself in the convenience of a private shower, ensuring a comfortable and conducive living environment.

2 in a room

Share college life with a roommate in our spacious two-in-a-room accommodation at Platinum Hostel, Gaza. Stay connected with WiFi, enjoy personalized climate control with air conditioning, entertain yourself with DSTV cable, and rejuvenate in the privacy of your own shower, fostering a sense of camaraderie and support.

3 in a room

Join a dynamic community of students in our three-in-a-room accommodation at Platinum Hostel, Gaza. This room type offers the perfect blend of comfort and sociability with amenities such as WiFi, air conditioning, DSTV cable, and a dedicated shower area, promoting interaction, friendship, and a memorable college experience.

amenites and facilities

air conditioning

Stay cool and comfortable in our air-conditioned rooms.

comfortable beds

Rest and recharge in our comfortable beds.

free WIFI

Stay connected with complimentary high-speed WiFi available throughout the hostel.

DSTV cable

Enjoy a wide range of entertainment options on DSTV cable for your relaxation.

gym

Stay fit and active in our fully equipped gym facilities.

parking lot

Conveniently park your vehicle in our designated parking area.

back-up generator

Experience uninterrupted power supply with our reliable standby generator.

well-stocked supermarket

Access a variety of essentials and snacks at our on-site well-stocked supermarket.

housekeeping

Enjoy a clean and well-maintained environment with our regular housekeeping services.
